bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of gan chuang 疳瘡 , gan -illness sores, characterized by a swift eruption, a severe nature, and rapid development, mostly affecting the face, the mouth, and the nose. This condition includes zou ma ya gan 走馬牙疳 , running horse dental gan -illness. Qian jin yi fang 千金翼方 24: 又急疳，食鼻口，數日盡，欲死方 , “Further recipe for acute gan -illness which eats the nose and mouth and ends after several days when one is about /wishes to die”.
